item.title: THM | Attacktive Directory | Walkthrough
item.description: Walkthrough For THM - Attacktive Directory Summary Attacktive Directory - “99% of Corporate networks run off of AD. But can you exploit a vulnerable Domain Controller?” In this walkthrough we will learn different ways to compromise the active directory using publicly available tools. You will learn a lot about Kerberos and how to crack their hashes, and how to use Impacket Secretsdump to dump Domain-control hashes, and how to access the machine with only NTLM hash with Evil-WinRM.
